tasks.title: Learn JavaScript
tasks.description: JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight interpreted (or just-in-time compiled) programming language with first-class functions.

tasks.title: Learn React
tasks.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on components.

tasks.title: Learn NextJs
tasks.description: Next.js is a popular open-source React framework that simplifies the development of server-rendered applications.
